title: Multiclass ROC Evaluation with Scikit-Learn
description: This lab demonstrates the use of Receiver Operating Characteristic (ROC) metric to evaluate the quality of multiclass classifiers using Scikit-learn library.

meta.title: Multiclass Classifier Evaluation | ROC Metric | Scikit-learn
meta.description: Learn how to use Receiver Operating Characteristic (ROC) metric to evaluate the quality of multiclass classifiers using Scikit-learn library.
meta.keywords: multiclass classifier, ROC metric, Scikit-learn, machine learning, data analysis
